customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Alright, we've got no people looking to check in at the moment anyway. That said, I'll have to receive anyone who does show up during this time."
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Cyno
customize.desc:
Cyno, Giustiziere dei segreti

La carta contiene tutta la passione del generale Mahamatra, ardente come il sole sopra il deserto.

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc:
Razor, Ragazzo lupo

"Carte difficili.
Ma... amiche..."

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc:
Collei, Germoglio di rinascita

"Urlando il nome della tua carta ad alta voce potrai aumentarne notevolmente il potere... Stai scherzando, vero?"

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
